title: Carl's Afternoon in the Park
description: Carl, the baby, and a new puppy spend an eventful afternoon in the park, riding on a carousel, romping in the flowers, and visiting a children's zoo.The Carl board books are sure to be baby's best friends!Titles in this Carl Goes ShoppingCarl's ChristmasCarl's Afternoon in the ParkCarl's MasqueradeCarl Goes to DaycareCarl's Birthday
author: Alexandra Day
